login.AMPOfflineUnavailableError: AMP Offline is currently unavailable. Please contact the AMP Administrator.
login.AMPUnreachableError: AMP Server is unreachable to authorize the login. Please try again later.

desktop.newDraftLegend: New Draft. These are new activities that have been saved as drafts.
desktop.newUnvalidatedLegend: New Unvalidated. These are new activities that have never been approved by the workspace manager.
desktop.existingDraftsLegend: Existing Drafts. These are activities that have been saved once and edited and saved as drafts.
desktop.existingUnvalidatedLegend: Existing Un-validated. These are activities that have been approved at least once by the workspace manager. These are edited activities that are not approved.

database.moreThanOneResultFound: Query returned more than one result.
